front.title: Cybersecurity framework Online Informative References (OLIR) submissions specification for completing the OLIR template

author.organization: Information Technology Laboratory (National Institute of Standards and Technology)

front.abstract: This document provides instructions and definitions for completing the Cybersecurity Framework (CSF) Online Informative References (OLIR) spreadsheet template available for download at https://www.nist.gov/cyberframework/informative-references. This document is intended to assist developers of References as a companion document to the spreadsheet template. Definitions are provided for column and row headings in addition to a discussion of expected values.

seriesInfo.name: NISTIR; NIST IR; NIST interagency report; NIST internal report
